L

LinRegr - Class in net.sytes.botg.array.math
https://algs4.cs.princeton.edu/code/edu/princeton/cs/algs4/LinearRegression.java.html The LinearRegression class performs a simple linear regression on an set of n data points (yi, xi).
LinRegr(double[], double[]) - Constructor for class net.sytes.botg.array.math.LinRegr
Performs a linear regression on the data points (y[i], x[i]).
